items.title: Be cautious although further upside toward 26,500 likely in Nifty; pick these top 2 PSU banks, says Anand Rathi's Jigar Patel
items.description: From a medium-term perspective, Jigar Patel maintains a cautious stance on the market. However, in the short term, he expects further upside in the coming week. The Nifty 50 has been well-supported, and this could propel Nifty towards the 26,500 level.

items.title: Mcap of 8 of top-10 most valued firms surges Rs 1.21 lakh cr; Reliance biggest winner
items.description: The combined market valuation of eight of the top-10 most valued firms surged Rs 1,21,270.83 crore last week, with Reliance Industries becoming the biggest gainer, in line with an outstanding rally in benchmark equity indices.

items.title: Trade Spotlight: How should you trade Tata Steel, Polycab, Chambal Fertilisers, Canara Bank, Vedanta and others on Monday?
items.description: The Nifty 50 is likely to consolidate further in the coming sessions before the start of a new leg of an upmove. Below are some trading ideas for the near term.

items.title: FPIs inflow hit 9-month high of Rs 57,359 cr in equities in Sep;  surpasses Rs 1 lakh cr mark
items.description: In terms of FPI inflows, the Hong Kong market was the top performer in September, with the Hang Seng index rising 14 per cent.
